Package frc.robot.BreakerLib.driverstation.gamepad.components

Class BreakerAnalogThumbstick

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.BreakerLib.driverstation.gamepad.components.BreakerAnalogThumbstick
Direct Known Subclasses:
BreakerGamepadThumbstick
public class BreakerAnalogThumbstick
extends java.lang.Object
Class which represents an analog HID thumbstick.

      invertX - Invert X-axis.
      yAxisPort - Y-axis port #.
      invertY - Invert Y-axis.
